mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM orderstatus os
INNER JOIN incomingdeadline id ON os.id_code = id.id_code INNER JOIN receivinginspection ri ON id.ri_id = ri.ri_id INNER JOIN progressinspection pi ON ri.pi_id = pi.pi_id INNER JOIN shippingstatus ss ON pi.ss_id = ss.ss_id INNER JOIN purchaseorder po ON ss.po_id = po.po_id INNER JOIN procurementplanregistration ppr ON po.ppr_id = ppr.ppr_id INNER JOIN contract co ON ppr.co_id = co.co_id INNER JOIN estimate es ON co.es_id = es.es_id INNER JOIN product pr ON es.pr_id = pr.pr_id
